title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After the 76ers started 3-0 with their new dynamic duo tandem of James Harden & Joel Embiid, Colin explains why Harden is surprisingly underrated compared to his peers. With reports that Russell Westbrook and the Lakers will mutually part ways after the season, Colin said it's time Russ realizes he might be the problem. Also, has Aaron Rodgers given us clues about his upcoming decision on his playing future. Plus, Former NBA star Chandler Parsons told us why Harden is a great a teammate and why Luka Doncic is the best player in the NBA.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
